column3: Audit SPARKIT for retrieval recall/coverage failures on hard STEM questions. Focus on query decomposition, source diversity, dedup/rerank, and evidence gaps.
Audit SPARKIT for evidence quality issues. Focus on source authority, recency handling, contradiction detection, and citation faithfulness.
Audit SPARKIT orchestration and multi-stage reasoning. Focus on planner/critic/verifier loops, uncertainty handling, and tool-selection policy.
Audit SPARKIT evaluation/grading robustness. Focus on MCQ extraction, exactMatch adjudication, grader agreement, calibration, and failure analysis.
Audit SPARKIT runtime system performance. Focus on parallel retrieval, caching strategy, retries, budget controls, and throughput without degrading quality.
